item.title: Post: that thing
item.description: That thing where you’re doing a thing but need to look up something and get an idea and start a thing but need a thing and you notice a thing and get an idea and start a thing and you notice a thing… Is that an card/ADHD thing? That sounds like an ADHD thing.
item.content:encoded:
That thing where you’re doing a thing but need to look up something and get an idea and start a thing but need a thing and you notice a thing and get an idea and start a thing and you notice a thing…

Is that an card/ADHD thing? That sounds like an ADHD thing.
